definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: But most of the Titans and giants sided with Cronos.
sentences.chinese: 但大多數的提坦們和巨人都站在克羅諾斯一邊。

sentences.english: If chosen, Chronos would drill into our neighbor's northern ice cap.
sentences.chinese: 如果確定了，克羅諾斯將會鑽入火星的北端冰帽。

sentences.english: The giants were defeated and Cronus ran away.
sentences.chinese: 巨人被擊敗，克羅諾斯逃走了。
